privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.subtitle: PescaPong Arcade
privacyPolicy.intro: At PescaPong we take your privacy seriously (even as an academic project!). This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you use our platform to play Pong, Snake, and chat with other users.
privacyPolicy.section1Intro: For the game and social features to work properly, we collect the following data:
privacyPolicy.section1Item1: Registration Data: Username, email address (if applicable), and password (stored in encrypted form).
privacyPolicy.section1Item2: Profile Data: Your avatar, friends list, and blocked users.
privacyPolicy.section1Item3: Game Data: Match history, scores, wins, losses, and statistics for Pong and Snake.
privacyPolicy.section1Item4: Communications: Messages sent through our real-time chat system.
privacyPolicy.section2Intro: Your data will NEVER be sold or shared with third parties. All collected information is used exclusively and strictly for:
privacyPolicy.section2Item2: Maintaining the matchmaking system and rankings.
privacyPolicy.section2Item3: Operating the live chat and managing game invitations.
privacyPolicy.section3Content: We do not use advertising tracking cookies. However, PescaPong uses your browser's local storage (`localStorage` or `sessionStorage`) to securely store your Authentication Token (JWT). This token is essential to keep your session open while browsing the page and playing.
privacyPolicy.section4Content: We implement security measures to protect your information, such as password hashing. However, we remind you that this is a test school project. We reserve the right to delete all database data (including user accounts, messages, and scores) at any time for server maintenance.
privacyPolicy.footerDeveloped: Developed with love, cigars, and lots of coffee by:

termsOfService.title: Terms of Service
termsOfService.subtitle: PescaPong Arcade
termsOfService.intro: Welcome to PescaPong. This project has been developed as part of School 42's academic curriculum. By accessing and using this platform, you agree to be bound by the following Terms of Service. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, you should not use our application.
termsOfService.section1Content: pescapong is an educational testing environment. It is not a commercial product. The service is provided "as is" and "as available." We reserve the absolute right to modify, suspend, or close the platform, as well as to reset databases, match histories, and scores at any time and without prior notice.
termsOfService.section2Para1: To access multiplayer features, you must create an account. You are solely responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your password and for all activities that occur under your account.
termsOfService.section2Para2: We reserve the right to suspend or delete accounts that we deem to violate these terms, at our sole discretion.
termsOfService.section3Intro: By using our chat rooms and matchmaking systems, you commit to maintaining a respectful environment. The following is strictly prohibited:
termsOfService.section3Item1: Harassment, insults, hate speech, or any toxic behavior towards other players in chat or direct messages.
termsOfService.section3Item2: Spamming, sending malicious links, or flooding communication channels.
termsOfService.section3Item3: Use of cheats: The use of scripts, bots, macros, or any third-party software designed to gain unfair advantages in Pong and Snake matches is strictly prohibited.
termsOfService.section4Content: All code, design, and mechanics of pescapong have been developed by the creator team. The intellectual property rights of the overall project are subject to the regulations of the 42 network curriculum.
